TextView.android:text: Issuance of Social Case Study Report, Case Summary/ Findings and Certificate of Indigency

The Municipal Social Welfare and Development Office issues Social Case Study Report/Certificate of Indigency required by outside welfare agencies/institutions to avail medical/financial assistance, discounted hospitalizations, legal assistance, scholarship assistance and change in the topographical error or certificate of live birth and certificate of marriage.
Indigent clients needing medication, referral to line agencies, indigents needing legal assistance and educational assistance
1. Barangay Certificate of Indigency/Residency (1 original copy)
2. Certificate from the Municipal Assessor’s Office regarding non-ownership of real property (1 original copy)
1. Requests of Social Case Study Report (SCSR)
2. Participates in Data Gathering & answers to questions asked
2.5. SCSR signed and approved by MSWDO
